ModernPractice.ab: "He puts the pomegranate twig into the mortar. aiβiiō vaŋᵛhibiiō imā̊ zaoϑrā̊. He pours water from the libation cup into the mortar. haomauuaitīš gaomauuaitīš haδānaēpatauuaitīš...".

ab.ab: "With his right hand he takes the cup of consecrated water located on the western side of the table, and pours a small amount of its contents into the mortar saying: "these libations [zōhr] are for the good [waters]" (aiwyō vanguhibyō imāō zaothrāo). He replaces the cup on the table and both priests conclude the chapter".
